ValidationRule.description: As part of the Defect NOKIASC-28942
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
((OR((CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.RecordType.Name = "Nokia Incident with Restoration"),(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.RecordType.Name = "Nokia Standard Case"),(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.RecordType.Name = "Nokia Information Request"))
&&
OR(ISPICKVAL(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.Status,"Closed"),ISPICKVAL(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.Status,"Completed"),ISPICKVAL(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.Status,"Cancelled"))) ||
((CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.RecordType.Name = "Problem") && OR(ISPICKVAL(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.Status,"Closed"),ISPICKVAL(CH_OriginatingCaseNumber__r.Status,"Cancelled"))))
&& ISNEW()
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 3rd Party Vendor case cannot be created on case in status Closed, Completed or Cancelled
